keyword: how many calories in a pbj
title: How Many Calories in a PB&J?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a pbj sandwich, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a PB&J?
assumptions: Standard PB&J: 2 slices white bread, 2 tbsp creamy peanut butter, 1 tbsp grape jelly; no added ingredients.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by bread type, PB brand, jelly flavor, portion sizes, and preparation; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard PB&J sandwich has about 400 kcal, with 13 g protein and 50 g carbs.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged items.

tweaks.label: Use whole wheat bread instead of white

faqs.q: How many calories in a standard PB&J?
faqs.a: About 400 kcal for 2 slices bread, 2 tbsp PB, and 1 tbsp jelly.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a PB&J?
faqs.a: Roughly 13 g, mostly from the peanut butter.

faqs.q: Does jelly add a lot of sugar to PB&J calories?
faqs.a: Yes, 1 tbsp jelly adds ~18 g sugars total, contributing to the carb count.

faqs.q: How to lower calories in a PB&J?
faqs.a: Use less PB, opt for low-sugar jelly, or choose thinner bread slices.
Moderate at 16 g fat per sandwich, primarily from peanut butter; choose natural PB to reduce saturated fat.
